contents.text: Thank you for calling Five9 in the East Bay, the leading provider of cloud contact center software for the digital enterprise.
Please hold while we connect you to a cloud support specialist.

navigationGoals: I need help troubleshooting an error deploying our cloud contact center instance
I’m experiencing frequent call drops on our Five9 cloud platform and need help troubleshooting.
Troubleshoot a REST API authentication failure on my cloud contact center instance
I’m having trouble logging into my cloud account and need someone to walk me through it.
I need help resolving a connectivity issue with the Five9 cloud API in our lab’s data pipeline.

contents.text: For billing and account inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing team.

navigationGoals: I need to update my payment method and get last month’s invoice
I need to review last month’s invoice and apply the veteran discount I was told about.
Retrieve last month’s usage metrics and detailed invoice from my billing dashboard
I don’t understand some charges on my bill and need help correcting my account billing.
I have questions about our account billing and student discount eligibility for our research group.

contents.text: For sales and product information, press 2.
To learn about our cloud contact center solutions, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to our sales team.

navigationGoals: I’d like to review your cloud contact center pricing and feature options
I’m evaluating your cloud contact center features for a veteran outreach center and need product details and pricing.
Compare feature tiers and pricing for your cloud contact center solution
I’d like to learn about your cloud contact center packages and their pricing.
I’d like information and a demo of Five9’s cloud contact center for our department’s outreach needs.

contents.text: For enterprise partnership and integration inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: I want to discuss an enterprise integration partnership and API access
I want to discuss integrating Five9 with our existing mission-critical CRM at our veteran support nonprofit.
Get specifications on SSO integration and partner SDK options for enterprise deployment
I’m interested in partnering with Five9 and need guidance on integrating your service with our system.
I want to explore an enterprise partnership to integrate Five9 with our university’s CRM system.
